responses.text: Are you in charge of the Maquis?

dynamic_line.yes: No man, that sounds like too much work.  I'm just the point man here on the farm.  It takes a lot to keep this place going even before the world ended.  The Chad is in charge of everything but he is at Barter Tower.
dynamic_line.no: No man, that sounds like too much work.  There is some fed based out of a strange sky-scraper they call 'Barter Tower'.

responses.text: Ok, I have to go now.

dynamic_line: Protecting my homestead from zombies, aliens and Canadians.  Or at least two of those!
I'm keeping my little territory here sovereign against alien invaders!

responses.text: Are you in charge of the Maquis?

dynamic_line: No. I'm good, I have everything I need.  Maybe someone else might sell you something.
I do not have anything for sale, man.  There are merchants around somewhere.

responses.text: Ok, I have to go now.
